sendMessageDescription.message: Send a message to {firstName} and receive a reply through your email.

subjectText.description: The subject for the message e.g. enquire to hire the photographer or to thank them.

errorSendingMessage.message: There was an error sending the message.

placeholder.message: {subject, select, hire {Hey {name}, we’d like to hire you to shoot ___ and ___.} default {Hey {name}, I’d like to thank you for sharing your photos on Unsplash. I’ve used one of them here: ___}}
